1.content: Before we Begin, how's Ashley gonna grow.
1.title: Ashley's start

11.content: So what about her will Ashley be expanding upon?
11.title: Inflation

111.content: "Hum...I think I'll try to see how filling up my entire body with something will go..." Ashley says to herself. However, she feels that just filling up with air isn't going to cut it. She's going to need to fill up with something more interesting than that.
111.title: Whole body.

1111.content: She considers filling up with some sort of gas that isn't air.
1111.title: Gas

11111.content:
It all started in Ashley's Mansion. Ashley looked in a magazine, which showcased various females, even if they did look like royalty, inflated like balloons. She sighed and said, "I sure wish I could become a living balloon..."

Red stepped into the room, as he said, "Ashley, I--"

The witch's black hair turned white in anger, with a menacing look on her face, as she shouted, "WHAT DO YOU WANT?! CAN'T YOU SEE I'M DAYDREAMING HERE?!?!"

Red just took a few steps back, shaking in fear, then he said, "I've been listening to what you were saying, Ashley..."

Ashley shouted, "AHA! I CAUGHT YOU LISTENING IN ON MY DAYDREAM!"

Red cowered in fear and said, "Ashley, let me finish... I've been listening to what you were saying, Ashley, and I'm here to help..."

Soon, Ashley's face and hair returned to normal once she calmed down, as she sat down and said, "I'm listening..."

Red then gave it some thought, then said, "I have an idea! I'll..."
11111.title: Helium, of course.

11112.content:
If she used Hydrogen, she figured she could fill herself up to some point, all she'd need is a spark inside her to make her fwoomp up even more.

Though with neon, she could potentially charge herself up and make herself a giant living bright-orange light bulb, and make herself impossible to miss.
11112.title: Something reactive, like hydrogen.

choices: She feels like she's going to struggle to keep it in.
She feels like it needs time to get her system fired up.
11113.content:
There was something Ashley was just a little curious about, though. Namely, would it be possible for someone to get so gassy they'd start to fill up from it. Not being one to worry about things like manners, she figures the best way to find out is to make herself extremely gassy in an effort to puff herself up.

While she never figured she'd be producing a hex with herself as the intended target, she figured it would be the best way, since she didn't want something that would wear off anytime soon. As soon as she figures out how to ramp up the power of it, she begins the murmurs the hex to herself, making sure she as she says it that the target is her. Some low gurgling sounds is the first sign it's working, and almost immediately Ashley feels particularly bloated.

The way it feels, however, causes Ashley to think that she might swell up rather slowly at first, the reason being...
11113.title: Starting to Bloat...

choices: Swell up larger than she is now.
Go see how her other female friends react to ther current state.
111131.content:
At that moment, Ashley recalled that the purpose of this particular hex is not only to make someone extremely gassy, but to induce the one thing being gassy is well known for.

"Ah...no big deal...I'll just have to try really hard to ke-" she starts to say, before being cut off by the first of many farts. "...yeah...here we go..." Ashley says, as she starts to focus her mind on keeping as much in as possible. At this point, she is starting to swell up, pausing each and every time she can't keep herself from passing gas, at least once every 15 seconds or so.

Fortunately for Ashley, she's neither the type to get embarrassed due to passing gas or the type to be bothered about how smelly the area around her is starting to become. After all, she's been through stranger things and is around things much more noxious than the fumes she's producing. Ashley simply takes it in stride, focusing on her goal of swelling up more than anything else at the moment. Once she's really focused, she's reduced her passage of gas down to around once every minute or so, giving her much more time to swell up between pauses. Eventually, she gets to the point where her body is easily able to replace what she loses, and finds this to be a good time to relax her mind, the point where she's as wide as she is tall.

She pats herself a bit, producing a poot or two each time she does. "Ah...this doesn't feel half bad..." she says, even though she can't seem to go 5 seconds without passing gas. Though at this point, that might actually be contributing to how she feels.

Ashley breathes in a bit. "Interesting how smelly I caused it to get in here.." she says, sound slightly amused that she managed to do such a thing.

"Now...this seems almost too good to not show off...but how should I do it..."
111131.title: Wide Windy Witch

1111311.content:
Ashley was swelling up, but was still slightly farting. She squeezed her ballooning butt cheeks together to stall her gas, which slowed down to one toot per hour. She strained as she held in her gas and said, "Y-Yes... It's working..."

Ashley's belly gurgled loudly as she kept swelling, and pretty soon, the entire room couldn't contain the gassy witch inside it. The walls of the room were torn asunder as Ashley continues bloating and farting. Pretty soon, she...
1111311.title: Holding It In...

choices: ...Red, checking to see if Ashley was okay.
11113111.content:
Ashley continued to balloon up with gas, eventually destroying the other rooms of her mansion. Her increasing gas-filled girth eventually pressed against the four walls of her own mansion, until eventually...

KABLAM!!!

The whole mansion, roof and all, was completely obliterated. Red, among other things like Ashley's spell books, was unharmed. She then felt something going on. It was...
11113111.title: Witchy Rubble

choices: but she can't hold it in.
11113112.content: Ashley thought if she gets any bigger she'll either pop or destroy her home. "I th-think it's better not to get too big, may-maybe i should fart s-some gas out" she started to fart a bit but then the minor tooting started to become forceful blasts of farts " i should s-stop before I def-deflate like a balloon!" Ashley struggles to keep it in..
11113112.title: A gassy situation.

choices: Skip the middle man, make herself a liquid girl.
1112.content: Filling up with some sort of fluid might be fun, but what, exactly?
1112.title: Liquid

choices: Keep the Hose in her Mouth
Remove the Hose with her Magic
11121.content:
Ashley decided to pay her acquaintance, Penny Crygor, a visit. Penny said, "Ashley, you're just in time."

Ashley tilted her head and asked, "For what?"

Penny said, "Presenting my grandpa's latest invention: The Pump-O-Tron 3000!"

Ashley then said, "What does it do?"

Penny took the garden hose of the machine and pushed it in Ashley's mouth. Then she said, "Just watch."

What will Ashley do?
11121.title: Water

111211.content: Ashley saw Penny activate the machine, and water began to flow into her mouth and body. As her body began to expand, she gurgled as she drank the water. Soon, the witch's body reached the size of...
111211.title: Keep the Hose in her Mouth

1113.content: "Hum...maybe being filled up with a whole lot of something solid will be exciting...what exactly should I go for, though...?" Ashley says to herself.
1113.title: Solid

choices: Tiny plastic beads used for stuffing material.
11131.content: "...yes...something smooth, rigid, and very, very tiny..." she says, as she starts to narrow down on what she'd like...
11131.title: Something small and bead-like.

11132.content: "...ooh, maybe something dirty...like something a young girl like me wouldn't even be seen near, let alone inside of her body...." says Ashley
11132.title: Something like sand or dirt.

choices: Be the trash bag, get taken to the dump.
A trip through Diamond City first.
111322.content:
"As filthy as it may be, filling up with garbage sounds rather interesting..." she says. The easy part was finding a spell that would allow her insides to stretch to accommodate whatever she decides to swallow. The hard part now was to learn to stomach the consumption of trash. As it turns out, her own mansion is the first and best place to start, as she has a decent amount of trash accumulated from used materials for potions and such. She figured that if she could keep down the contents of her own trash, then she'd be ready for anything.

With that decided, she gets right to work as she comes one of many trash cans she keeps around the house. She starts by simply pulling something out and swallowing it whole Once she's determined enough to proceed, she moves on to pulling out handfulls of trash and gulping it down one after the other. Being able to handle that, she immediately cuts to the chase and sticks her head in the trash can and gulps down any trash she can get inside her mouth in one bite, which is a lot more thanks to the spell she had cast on herself.

She lets out an undignified belch as she finishes off the contents of the trash can. The shape of her body was certainly looking the part of being something routinely filled with trash, with some of the larger things distending her body slightly. Ashley found that being in this shape was rather amusing. "Now this is something, I figured I would slightly resemble a living trash bag, but I'm really playing the part a lot better than I thought." she says, ready to put her skills as a living trash bag to good use.

-------------

After finishing off all the trash inside of her house, she waddles her way outside, her body filled to about ten feet wide and about the same in height. If she didn't resemble a trash bag before, she certainly looked like one now. The black and highly elastic parts of her outfit were stretched much wider than her dress and overtook her dress as the dominate color on her body. "I wonder...would I be picked up and taken straight to the dump if I just sat where they pick up the trash...or I could take a stroll through the city on my way there and sample what the city has to offer before I get to the main course..."
111322.title: Gulping Garbage

112.content:
Ashley feels like she needs to do something to make herself look older without actually aging herself. And to do that, she feels she should inflate some part of her body that would make her seem like she's older than she really is.

But which one?
112.title: Normal Part (Butt, belly, or breasts?)

11212.content: How will she inflate her belly?
11212.title: Belly

1122.content: Of course, no one would take the transformation seriously if she simply made one part of her body larger, to look mature she'd have to pair it with something else as well...
1122.title: Combination of two.

113.content: "If I'm going to inflate a certain spot, maybe I should be just a little creative about what part I'm going to inflate..." Ashley says to herself. "...perhaps I'll inflate my extremities in some way...but which ones should I start with..."
113.title: Unusual Part (Head, feet, hands?)

choices: Play with the shape of her body.
Play with the form of her body.
114.content: Ashley figures that if she's going to inflate, she would try to do it with style. Not just to show off, but to see what she can really do to herself.
114.title: Inflating With Style

choices: Inflate herself like a long balloon used to make balloon animals.
Inflate herself so that she's not wide in a certain direction.
Inflate herself so she's filled up into an usual shape.
1141.content: Yeah, just being round might be interesting enough, but why just do that when you can seriously alter the shape of your body as you fill up? At least, that's what going through Ashley's mind as she considers what to do to herself.
1141.title: Play with the shape of her body.

11411.content:
Having already determined she's going to puff up in the first place, Ashley already has a potion that will allow her to puff up. But, for this, she felt she needed something else. And as soon as she gets her hands on a stretching potion, she starts to mix it with the inflation potion. "Both of these together should give me the desired effect..." she rationalizes, before downing the concoction.

At first, she swells up about as normal as you can get for being inflated, the swelling starting at her midsection and working it's way out. Soon, the stretching potion starts to take effect at well. Her body has an easier time swelling vertically than horizontally, especially now that she's much more stretchy overall. By the time the expansion makes it up to her head, hands, and feet, Ashley's body somewhat looks like the shape of a blimp. Though like most ways of expansion, once she's filled to that point, her vertical expansion starts causing her to stretch out longer, while only being around two feet wide or so. While she's gaining width so gradually it's hard to even tell she's getting wider, she's already starting to grow taller.

Ashley looks about with interest, watching as the ground around her is getting further away as her body keeps getting longer. Eventually, it comes to a stop, with Ashley stopping at a size of 10 feet long and two feet wide. "Not bad...but I could probably grow a lot longer than this..." she says, as she conjures up another inflation potion, placed directly into her mouth. She spits out the bottle once she's consumed the contents, and seems satisfied when she starts to swell up again. But as she swells, she starts to get curious about that she could do with this.

On one hand, playing around with swelling up in the form of a long balloon might be rather entertaining, but on the other hand, she does realize she's the same kind of balloon that's typically used to make balloon animals...and she wants to see what she can do with that.
11411.title: Getting high without helium.

11412.content: Ashley could think of plenty of things that were inflated yet not round at every angle. She could just let herself get wider all around but not grow any higher than that, or she could squash herself from the front or sides as well.
11412.title: Inflate herself so that she's not wide in a...

114121.content:
Wide. That's the one thought that's going through her mind in all this. She wanted to see herself span quite a distance, and naturally, the best way to do that is to make sure she can only expand outward instead of upward.

Getting herself as wide as she was tall was no big deal, one inflation potion later and she was already in the process of swelling up. However, as she swells up, she begins to focus on how her body is expanding, even though she doesn't have to do any of the hard work until she's actually as wide as she is tall. Once she's there, though, she begins putting as much of her magic as possible towards keeping her body from being able to swell higher. She knows it's working when she can see her body start to spread outward, resembling a large, round air-mattress as she does. Once the potion starts to wind down, Ashley's about 10 feet wide all around, and only three feet high.

Confident that she's trained her body to expand this and only this way, she lets go of her focus, and sure enough, her body naturally retains the shape it's in.

"Nice...I'm practically my own bed...now...what should I do now that I can properly expand that this way..."
114121.title: Making her bed herself.

choices: Reduce herself to only her head and feet.
Change herself into a living plush-toy, then stuff herself.
Some other way to alter her form.
1142.content: The one problem with the way her body is right now is that it's not made for being filled up. Ashley begins to feel that she could do some modification to her body to improve how well she can fill herself up.
1142.title: Play with the form of her body.

11423.content: Ashley realizes that there was way to inflate that she didn't think of until just then. "I wonder what berry transformation would be like..." Ashley says, wondering if she should go with this or try to think of something else...
11423.title: Berry, maybe?

choices: Less wide than she is tall, but still gradually filling up.
Huge, but no further increase in size without help.
114231.content:
"Seem like it might be fun...I'll need to make something that causes that, though..." Ashley says, as she begins to gather up what she needs.

Later, Ashely holds in her hand a potion bottle with a royal purple fluid inside of it. "Hope this works..." Ashley says. Gulping the contents down, Ashley waits to see if it will actually start taking effect. Her skin starts to change colors and leaking a fine coating of juice, which starts to stain her clothes and make them into a purplish color. She knows she's really going to bloat up when she starts to feel pressure build up within her. And sure enough, Ashley begins to visibly bloat up with juice. As she bloats, she wonders just how this is going to work out...or more specifically, how big she'll be when the bloating stops.
114231.title: Ashley the Blueberry

1142311.content:
Ashley could feel the juice flowing around her causing her stomach and such to swell. Her long purple dress beginning to ride up as her body started getting big for it.

Her purple skin stretching as the juice fills her body up, she looked at her swelling body and smiled. She was becoming wider than she was tall. Her dress was beginning to tear at the seams as her body filled it up. She originally was gonna make the antidote after she stopped swelling but then it came to her...

She wasn't slowing down...
1142311.title: Swell berry

choices: Let herself fill up the room.
Shrink down to keep from outgrowing the room.
11423111.content:
Ashley, not wanting to realize she'd made a mistake, begins to wonder what she should do with this opportunity that presented herself. If she didn't do anything she could see what it's like to fill up the room, or at least see how far she can get in that regard.

On the other hand, that might make it hard to see just how big she can get without breaking her house, so she considered trying to shrink herself as she swelled. That spell in particular is one she can remember off the top of her head.
11423111.title: Riding it out either way!

choices: Find someone to take care of you.
Find someone to be with you.
114231112.content:
Ashley began to murmur a spell to herself, and as soon as she finished, she could feel her bloating nearly double. Her round body remains the same size while her hands, feet, and hands begin to grow smaller as the spell takes effect. She has to go to some effort to keep herself from letting out an excited squeal, even if there's no one she has to protect her reputation from. Once the excitement fades, she starts to relax as all that she can see around her is just her wide, purple body.

The bloating eventually comes to a stop as Ashley is roughly the size of a small action figure, her tiny extremities and head being very difficult to see compared to her round body, which hadn't since grown larger than 5 feet wide. From her perspective, she might as well have been the size of a skyscraper, a fact she was quite pleased about.

Now all she has to do is lure someone besides Red here to help her out...or perhaps share this experience with her indefinitely. Ashley murmurs a levitation spell in order to make herself float as she considers her options...
114231112.title: Shrink down to keep from outgrowing the room.

choices: Something balloon-like, or maybe a balloon.
Some other type of inflatable toy.
1143.content: "...why am I just considering playing with the shape of my body? I could easily change myself into something that's specifically suited for swelling up." She thinks, as she wonders what she might turn herself into...
1143.title: Other forms of outright transformation.

11432.content: Ashley wondered if she could try making herself into a blimp...
11432.title: Blimp

114322.content: Maybe a mode of transportation that is still like a balloon, like a hot air balloon.
114322.title: Hot Air Balloon

1143222.content: Why be like a balloon when she could be one...
1143222.title: Balloon?

11432222.content: Or, maybe she could assume the form of a bubble?
11432222.title: Bubble

choices: Her body becomes multiple bubbles in order to remain stable.
Her body continues to lose definition, until she's just a big red bubble.
114322221.content:
The thought of becoming a bubble catches Ashley's interest as she thought of ways to change her body. "Hum...I could always call on Red if I really needed to use my arms..." she thinks to herself, as she reads over the spell. After reading it over a few times, she feels confident enough to read it out aloud, making sure to identify herself as the target of the spell.

After reciting the spell, Ashley begins to glow a faint blue, and can feel herself filling up. In fact, she's actually filling up all around, every part of her expanding at once, her body losing it's shape as she becomes spherical. Because of the way her body is expanding, it doesn't take too long for her to become completely spherical. In fact, her head is already completely stretched across the surface of her body, with what's left of her hands and feet just now finishing up as well. In the end, even her hair is simply part of the sphere that is now her body, and the only evidence that she was ever a person is that she still resembles herself. Now, she simply floats there, occasionally wobbling.

"Ah, that worked better than I thought it would...I wonder if there's going to be any side effects to this..."
114322221.title: Becoming a Big Bubble

choices: She can't, and her mind starts to get split up between the bubbles.
She has a central bubble that serves as a hive mind of sorts.
1143222211.content:
"Wait...there's no breeze in here...why am I wobbling so much, then...?" She asks, before she starts to feel herself bend inward in the middle, as if her body was a cell in the process of dividing. In a moment, the one big bubble is now two bubbles that look just like Ashley. Though beyond looks, they both seem to share the same mind. "...strange...I seem to have split in two..." They both say at once. But then, one, then the other split. And they continue to split, with Ashley only able to witness as her body is splitting into a great number of bubbles, until each one is one inch at most.

"Ah...it seems to have stopped..." all of them say at once. "But I wonder...how am I able to be all of these bubbles at once without problems..."
1143222211.title: Big Bubbles don't stay that way...

choices: Ashley notices how close Red's getting
Ashley doesn't notice and the blower touches her!
1143222212.content:
Ashley marveled at the sensation, her body colors spreading out evenly over her translucent surface, completely round with a face that seemed painted on. A slight red hue glowed from within her body, evidence that she was empty except for a bit of magic and some air. The only problem, she quickly discovered, was her lack of mobility. "Hmmn, well this is no good..." She thought to herself, idly bobbing in mid air. "Red, get in here!" She shouted, causing her to drift back slightly.

The small devil creature appeared quickly, blinking at his mistress's new state. "Wow, Miss Ashley, is that really you?" His finger went out to poke as she wobbled desperately.

"Ah! Stop! Yes, yes it is me!" The young witch paused as Red withdrew his hand, the danger of popping no longer as imminent as it was before. "I wish to move around, go grab the hair dryer from my bathroom." Red paused for a moment, confused, but did as she commanded, returning with the magically-modified appliance. "Good, now turn it on, but don't bring it too close!"

The little demon clicked the switch on the side, blowing a slow stream of air as he followed Ashley along, her light body drifting on a gentle current. "There we are...heehee, this feels amazing! I've never felt so light before. Bring my spellbook Red, I desire to go out." The demon obeyed and soon the two were floating along out the door. As they continued, Red's mind started to wander a bit, and the blower got closer and closer to Ashley's body...
1143222212.title: Bubbly girl

choices: Keep going until Ashley is satisfied.
11432222122.content: Ashley gasps a little as she feels the blower come in contact with her, making her body swell up immediately upon contact. While she would typically berate Red for such an action, the feeling of swelling up like this feels nice enough to give him a pass on this. Red notices, but then sees his mistress' reaction and wonders if he should keep going.
11432222122.title: Big Bubble Blowing

choices: She keeps swelling up even larger
She finds more people to envelop
114322221221.content:
"Er, mistress, are you sure you're ok?" Red walked up behind her, the bubble girl's body blowing outward to about 5' now, everything on her stretching and expanding tight.

"Mmhyes...I'm fine...just keep that going..." She purred, her body stretching out tighter and thinner, pushing back down at her red companion. "I've never been this big before, and it feels great to keep growing!"

"But...what if you pop?" The little devil tried to point out before Ashley's stretching side pressed down against him. He felt the thin film of the bubble witch start to yield, even Ashley was scared for a moment as the pressure became incredible. Suddenly, she felt a brief stretching as her skin enveloped Red completely, the small demon now enveloped inside the 6' wide witch.

"Aaahahaha! I can't believe I was worried. There's no way I can pop if I can handle you, Red. Now keep blowing me up!" Ashely demanded, the small demon inside her turning the magical blower on once more as she felt the delightful sensation of growth again, her middle stretching out to almost 7' as a slight breeze started to pick up, carrying Ashley out and away.
114322221221.title: Keep going until Ashley is satisfied.

choices: Follow the urge to keep swelling.
See what else can be done.
1143222212211.content:
The fact that she's starting to drift wherever the winds may take her was the last thing on Ashley's mind. "Oh yes...larger...wider...the biggest bubble will be me..." she says to no one in particular as she starts to surpass the 10 foot wide mark while drifting further from civilization and higher into the sky. Though to Ashley, all this meant was that she now had plenty of space to grow and swell without having to worry about her fun being interrupted prematurely, at least for the moment anyway.

15 feet...20 feet...25 feet...as she grows, Ashley becomes more excited, though in her usual low-key demeanor. Nonetheless, Ashley is quite amazed by how big she's already gotten, which just makes her all the more willing to keep going.

30...40...50 feet...she's easily the size of a house by now, and so wrapped up in swelling up that she hasn't even noticed that Red had bailed a while back, though to be fair she couldn't care less what Red was doing anyway. Though at the very least, he left the magic blower inside of her, which is suspended in the middle, still making Ashley swell up. With it inside of her, she could easily control just how big she'd get before she gave it a rest.

But a strong part of her really didn't want to give it a rest.
1143222212211.title: Shall I Continue, Then?

1143222212212.content:
Of course, Ashley wasn't exactly going unnoticed. As she floats about, she's being tailed by none other than Penny, who is quite interested in finding her friend in such an unusual state. Eventually, her inquisitive mind takes over and she calls out to Ashley, which snaps her out of her bubble-filled train of thought. Beyond that, Ashley doesn't seem at all concerned that Penny is seeing her in this state.

Ashley floats over to Penny, easily towering over the young scientist. "So, just how long have you been following me? And...do you happen to like what you see?"

This makes Penny giggle a little. "Oooh, you look amazing, really, so definitely yes! You're just so nice and round and big...ooh, you even have your little friend inside of you too!

Penny's comment starts to give Ashley an idea, and she ejects Red from inside of her body. and then starts to press against Penny. Penny giggles a little as she gets the idea, and pushes her way inside of of Ashley.

Once inside, Penny starts to feel strange. Almost like she's about to undergo a transformation herself.

But would she become a bubble, or something else...
1143222212212.title: Bubbly Witch: Even Bubblier Scientist!

choices: Stay inside Ashley while they float around
Push out of Ashely and seperate
11432222122121.content:
Ashley's dark red body contained some sort of mist, swirling translucently as it enveloped Penny fully. Rather then feeling the need to cough, the mist flowed into and through the scientist as she felt a strange tingle all over her body. Her middle began to blow out and plumpen, clothing smoothing out over her surface like a rubber ball. "Wow! What is this?" She tried to run a hand over her surface, but before long her limbs were too far apart to bend. Red hovered around the red bubble, watching the young girl grow and round out into a perfect pink ball, her face stretched along the top hemisphere complete with glasses. Her body turned translucent as she floated around within Ashley, every motion causing her to bob and waft around.

"Hehee! This is fun! I've never felt so light before...but why isn't your demon friend a bubble also?" She bumped against Ashley's side, squeaking against her surface a bit.

"Hm, I guess he's just immune. It's just as well, we'll need someone to keep us mobile." The witch looked down toward Red as he grumbled lightly, flapping his wings and helping to push his round mistress along.

After seeing the demon exit Ashley, Penny wondered if it would be fun to leave her witchy bubble, though she may not exit as cleanly as the demon. Still, staying and blowing up inside Ashely could be fun also...
11432222122121.title: Bubble within a bubble

choices: Penny cleanly pushes herself out of Ashley.
114322221221212.content:
As much as she didn't mind spending time inside of her friend as a bubble, Penny was curious enough to see if it was at all possible to push herself out of Ashley's body.

With one concentrated effort, Penny flings herself at one of the walls of Ashley's body, ready to see just what would result.
114322221221212.title: Pushing Apart

1143222212212122.content: As Penny's body pushes against Ashley's inner surface, something strange starts to happen...
1143222212212122.title: A mishap occurs!

11432222122121221.content:
Penny found that she wasn't hitting Ashley's surface with enough force to push outward, but instead with just enough for her body to start combining with Ashley's. Ashley smirks with a bit of amusement as she realizes what's happening. "Well isn't this something, we're about to become a single, even bigger bubble."

All Penny can do is yelp a bit as they finish merging. Their body has a red and pink split, with Ashley and Penny on each side respectively. "Well! That certainly was an experience!" exclaims Penny, not sure what to make of the situation.

Ashley, on the other hand, seemed a lot more amused by this even though half of her body was now pink. "Well, I'm not complaining, after all, this did make us bigger, and it feels interesting to be fused with someone else. Even more because it's you as opposed to anyone else."

Penny blushes at the sound of this. "Well, given the kind of stuff we tend to do together, something bizarre like this was bound to happen sooner or later!"

And so, they begin to wonder what to do next...
11432222122121221.title: Two-in-One!

115.content: What other ways could Ashley think of to get blown up...
115.title: Some other option?

1151.content: What other fun could Ashley have...
1151.title: In her control...

choices: A group gets the better of her
1152.content: Unknown to Ashley, someone other than her wants to fulfill her wish.
1152.title: Out of her control...

choices: science (pennys gonna need to be involved)
12.content: how will she gain weight?
12.title: weight gain

121.content:

Ashley walked into her room, looking around and noticing the bland, pink walls.

"Do I seriously need pink walls, Peach?" Ashley questioned, putting her bony rump down on the bed.

"Yes, I am certain." Peach sternly answered, patting Ashley on the head, "You'll get used to being a princess in training, don't worry, it's easier than you think. Oh, and don't call me Peach, call me mom, mama, or mommy."

"I'll bring a cake up to you." Peach winks, and then closes the door.

Ashley rolled onto her back, tossing a coin up and down. Peach had seen the condition Ashley was living in, an old, beaten up mansion, with her friend Red. So, Peach offered her wings to slide Ashley under, it would be a win win for everyone. At least, that's what Peach said. Ashley wasn't up for being sissified like this. Ashley walks over to the bathroom and slides into the shower. In minutes, Ashley emerged from her room, dressed up casually, as she tosses her dress over to a Toad.

"Wash that for me." She spoke without emotion, as the Toad catches it.

Ashley goes down to the kitchen, noticing Peach was in there. Ashley stealthily pulled out mushroom dust, old spiderwebs, and a candy tooth, hobbling back upstairs. Ashley grins, having shrunk her cauldron to sneak it in, she makes it grow back. She grabs a mixing spoon, the green, bubbly liquid inside it blorbled and glorbled. Ashley snickered, pouring the ingredients in as she chanted.

"Mushroom dust, I cast a hex on you...Old spiderwebs, this'll make black walls...Candy tooth, soon the walls with rooth. GOTHALONGOUS PAINTAGAGIS!"

12132.content:
It was a nice, bright, sunny day in Diamond City- the vibrant landscape buzzing with activity.

Gross.

Ashley was cooped up in her mansion, furiously rifling through bookshelves and flipping through books, tossing each one aside angrily. Before long, her imp companion- Red- flew over, curious what she was up to.

"Hey, Ashley? You lookin' for something? Woah!" Red said, quickly dodging a book Ashley threw at him.

"Of course I'm looking for something, obviously!" she yelled, "I'm looking for a way to make my magic more powerful! All these books just talk about spells and potions and summoning monsters- I can't find a single entry about getting a boost in raw power, though!" Ashley explained. Red raised an eyebrow at her.

"Power, huh? Hmm...hold on-" he said, causing Ashley to look over at him curiously. He flew over to a pile of books, sorting through them- before pulling out a black and pink tome. "Aha, here it is! Beginner's Guide to Honing Magic Powers!"

Ashley scoffed. "I'm no beginner, Red." She said, getting up and walking over to him. "What good is a beginner's guide gonna do for me?"

"Right here- page one!" Red said, opening the book and beginning to read out loud. "It says here, 'Before being channeled into spells, magic is generated inside a Witch's body. The amount of magic a Witch can generate usually depends on her size.'" he said, grinning up at Ashley. "So all you have to do is get bigger, and then you'll be more powerful!"

Ashley blinked in surprise. Of course- it was so simple! Why hadn't she thought of it before? "Huh...Red, that could work!" Ashley said, before running off.

Confused, Red called out after her- "Wh- hey, Ashley! Where are you going?"

"To the kitchen, dummy!" She answered.

"The kitchen?" Red repeated. "Don't you wanna like, go to the gym and get buff?"

Ashley scoffed, "Seriously? No way! exercising is boring, and it takes too long to get results!" she said, smirking at him. "I'm just gonna eat and eat until I'm huge!"

And so, she ran off to the kitchen- Red hovering behind her, nervous about what she was gonna try to do.

121322.content:
As Ashley dashed into the mansion's sizable kitchen, she threw open the closest pantry and was delighted to find it packed with all sorts of snacks. It was a good thing she'd stocked up!

"Ashley, are you sure this is such a good idea?" Red asked, earning himself a whack on the head from Ashley.

"Of course it is- all my ideas are good!" she said, before ordering the imp "now, Red- get cooking!"

Red blinked in confusion. "Cooking?" He asked.

"Yeah! I know I have hamburger patties and hot dogs and stuff in the fridge. I think there are also frozen pizzas in the freezer- and I can't exactly eat all that cold!" she said, taking out boxes of snack cakes and cookies and bags of chips from the cupboard- It seemed like Ashley's kitchen contained mostly junk food. Which was good for her, it meant more calories- which meant she'd get bigger faster! "Now fire up the ovens and start making me some food! I'll get started on the stuff you don't need to prepare while you work." she said, carrying the pile of unhealthy snack foods over to her table.

Red groaned, begrudgingly getting to work. "Well, just don't blame my cooking if this doesn't work out." he muttered.

As her imp servant worked, Ashley dug in- stuffing her face aggressively, trying to eat as much as possible. She tore through boxes of candy, chocolate bars, and packets of cookies with wild abandon. She'd gorge herself with handfulls of popcorn, pretzels, and chips before guzzling soda to wash it all down. She popped cheap snack cakes into her mouth whole, barely giving herself time to chew the spongy processed pastry before shoving another in. She haphazardly threw any empty wrappers or cans aside, not caring if she made a mess- That'd be Red's problem later when she made him clean it up.

By the time she'd eaten her way through the big pile of snacks, she was feeling a bit bloated- So she let out a nice loud resounding belch- like a proud declaration of success. She leaned back in her chair, placing her hands on her belly as she looked down, grinning.

"Aw, yeah! I can already see it working!" She said. Under her red dress, she'd developed a visible gut- A nice round potbelly about the size of half a basketball bulged out from her middle. She gave it a satisfied pat, "at this rate, I'll be big enough to generate a whole ton of magic in no time! I need more food- and lots of it!" she said, hopping up and running to the pantry, grabbing another pile of junk food- As much as she could possibly carry- nearly double the amount she'd just finished eating!

"Hurry up, Red! I'm gonna be hungry again as soon as I finish this!" She laughed, before digging in once again.

132.content:
Kat and Ana, despite being ninjas, still had that element of childlike playfulness, and most people loved that about them. Ashley, on the other hand, just found it annoying. The young ninjas constantly asked her if she wanted to play with them, even though it was obvious to the untrained eye that she was busy practising magic or making a potion of some kind. They just didn't seem to get the hint. Of course, the incessant "Hi Ashley, wanna play a game with us in the woods?" eventually became too irritating to deal with any longer, but Ashley never expected that she would soon find the perfect way of dealing with that problem.

That fateful afternoon, Ashley was trying to make a potion that very little was known about. Unlike most potions, however, brewing this one was Red's idea, and since Red had been an effective and loyal assistant to Ashley all these years, she decided to grant him this one request. All that they knew about this potion was the name Voraphiliax Potion and the ingredients, which oddly enough consisted mostly of food. It was no surprise therefore that, halfway through, Ashley asked whether she was making a potion or lunch. Soon, though, it was ready, and she collected some of the maroon liquid in a small bottle.

Ashley then gave the bottle to Red, who took a sip and then immediately spat the concoction back out. "Blegh! This tastes like puke-covered poop!" he exclaimed in disgust. Ashley sighed as it dawned on her that the only way they were going to find out what exactly the potion did was for her to drink it. Red warned her to hold her nose if she was going to drink it, but this was unnecessary - Ashley had drunk fouler-tasting potions in the past. Quickly, she took the bottle back from Red and downed its contents in one. The two of them anticipated the effect this potion would have on Ashley.

1322.content:
Ashley and Red waited for about ten seconds for something to happen, but nothing did.

"Did we just use up a load of food and lizard tails for a potion that does absolutely nothing?" Ashley asked with more than a hint of anger in her voice. Red knew that a furious Ashley was never a good sign, so he tried to calm her down by suggesting that maybe the potion would only take effect after a much longer period of time. It didn't do much good though. Ashley glared at her assistant, who was frozen in fear. Silently, he prayed that she would be at least a little merciful to him as he braced himself for the worst.

Suddenly, the two of them heard the doorbell ring. For Red, this was a huge relief. "Should I get that?" he asked Ashley, who nodded silently in response and then turned back to the cauldron. Red opened the door and standing outside were two recognisable characters in Diamond City: Kat and Ana. Before Red could say anything to them, their cheery voices had reached Ashley's ears.

"Hi Ashley!" Kat shouted happily. "We're going to see who can find 50 pink flowers in the woods first!" "Wanna join in?" Ana added excitedly. As usual, Ashley was not even remotely happy about this.

"Will you two just leave me alone?" Ashley snapped at the two ninjas. "I'm very busy right now and I don't have time to play your silly games," she continued as she stomped towards the door, "so get out of here before I ..."

Suddenly, Ashley noticed something unusual. It was a smell that reminded her of roast chicken, and it seemed to be coming from Kat and Ana. Although Ashley wasn't feeling particularly hungry, this did remind her that she hadn't had lunch yet, and Kat and Ana smelled so delicious, plus their grating cheerfulness would probably vanish for good if they wound up inside her stomach. As Ashley started to think about this, the tiniest of smiles formed on her lips.

13223.content:
When Kat and Ana saw the little smile on Ashley's face, their eyes lit up. They turned to each other and started to chatter excitedly. Ashley, however, paid no attention to what they were saying. Instead, after a few seconds, she grabbed Ana by the shoulders and lifted her up. By the time either of the two ninjas realised what was going on, Ana was already being held upside-down over Ashley's wide-open mouth. Her screams were quickly muffled when her head was forced inside Ashley's mouth, which was somehow able to open wide enough. Ashley then ripped Ana's katana off of her back before starting to swallow her. Kat grabbed hold of Ana's legs and tried to pull her out of Ashley's mouth but the witch lifted her up off the ground and continued swallowing Ana undisturbed. In fact, now that Kat's hands were holding on tightly to Ana's legs, Ashley could now eat them both at the same time. Despite the two young ninjas' best efforts to avoid being eaten, it wasn't long before Ana was completely inside Ashley's belly and Kat's head was inside her mouth. Once again, she had to rip the katana off of Kat's back before continuing to swallow her. Before long, Ashley had finished eating Kat and Ana, and her belly expanded until it was about as round as a beach ball and a little bit bigger.

"Mmm, that was tasty," Ashley said before letting out a big burp. "I wonder, did that potion allow me to do that?" All of a sudden, she felt Kat and Ana squirming around inside her belly, and moments later, it felt like they were kicking and punching in there. She could also hear them screaming "Let us out!" among other things, but of course she had no intention of letting them out any time soon. In fact, Ashley seemed to enjoy the feeling of Kat and Ana kicking inside her. She gave one more small burp and patted her belly a couple of times before heading back into her mansion and closing the door.

Red was standing in the middle of the room. He had been watching all along, but he didn't seem at all surprised. Like Ashley, he had drawn the conclusion that the potion they had prepared earlier was connected to this. However, he did seem concerned about Kat and Ana's welfare. "Are they gonna be all right in there?" he asked. "Well," Ashley replied, "it depends. The only way Kat and Ana can survive in my belly is if there's always some air to breathe and I don't make any stomach acid." "And since that's not how your stomach usually works," Red added, "it depends on whether its behaviour was changed by the potion or not."

Inside Ashley's belly, Kat and Ana could hear everything Ashley was saying, but the gurgling noises her stomach made meant they couldn't hear much else. It was pitch black in there and the two ninjas were surrounded and squished by the pulsating walls of her stomach. There was also barely enough room for them to move around inside and no amount of force could help them break out. It looked like Kat and Ana would be trapped inside Ashley's belly for the rest of their lives.

She heard Ana plead to be let out, but the dark-haired girl had other ideas. "You girls were so delicious," she said to Kat and Ana, "and you've given me this lovely big belly." As if to emphasise the latter point, Ashley stood back up and lifted her belly up. Then, without warning, she let go of it. The sudden drop caused her belly to bounce a little and made Kat and Ana scream. "Mmm, that felt nice," Ashley said with a little smile, ignoring the young ninjas' protests. But she wasn't done yet. Every single day it's 'Hi Ashley, we're gonna go play in the woods, wanna join us?' I expected you to get the hint after a while, but no. Still every single day you show up out of the blue and distract me from something I am actually enjoying! I'm sick of it!"

For a few seconds, the only sound in the room was Ashley's belly quietly gurgling. Then Kat spoke up. "We didn't mean to make you mad," she said apologetically. "Yeah," Ana chimed in, "we're really sorry. We promise not to bother you again if you let us out. Please?"

For all the great things about having Kat and Ana in her belly, Ashley knew that she had to find out as much about the potion's effects as possible. Then a thought crossed her mind: maybe the two ninjas could be of use to her.

"Still want out, huh?" Ashley asked. Judging by how loud the reply of "YES!" was, she guessed that Kat and Ana said it at the same time. "OK, I'll try to get you out," she continued, "but only if ..." Ashley then paused to consider just what kind of deal she should make.

"We promise we won't tell anyone about this!" Kat shouted over the noisy gurgling all around her. "And we'll stop asking if you want to play with us!" Ana quickly added. Of course, those were always going to be part of the deal, but the big-bellied witch needed something more.

"That's a good start," Ashley replied as she gently rubbed her belly with both hands, "but I also need you to help me. You see, the reason I could swallow you two whole is because of a new potion I made. I need to know everything about what it does and, unless you can tell me anything about what it's like inside my stomach ..."

Kat and Ana immediately yelled "Gross!" and "Noisy!" respectively. Ashley sighed and roll her eyes; she obviously wanted something more informative than either of those. Clearly relying on the young ninjas to provide information wasn't going to work. Then the pair mentioned that it was completely dark and they couldn't see a thing. That was a little better as it gave Ashley a new idea.

"You might not be much help in there," Ashley said while patting her belly, "but I believe a friend of yours might. Penny Crygor, to be precise." Penny's grandfather, Dr. Crygor, had become obsessed with his newest invention yet again so no doubt he wouldn't be available to help, but the younger scientist might be, would be better equipped to let Ashley know what her insides were like and she had a good rapport with Kat and Ana. "Promise you'll bring her to me," the witch continued, "and I'll let you out."

Kat and Ana protested against the offer. They knew how horrid it was inside Ashley's stomach and it sounded like this deal would result in Penny ending up in there. They couldn't wish that on a friend! However, when Ashley pointed out that a) her deal was the only way she was ever letting them out and b) she could always go and visit Penny herself, they realised they had no choice but to accept.

134.content:
Ashley groaned as she sat around, there was literally nothing to do in all of her haunted mansion. She's tried all her spells, she's done every wild thing she could think about under the sun, and now, the only time she needed to kill time, she spent waiting on a package to arrive. So, in a fit of boredom, she flicked some darts at the dartboard. And she was having as much of a ball as she could until Red knocked her over in a hasty attempt to catch some random goo beast. Ashley turns around, growling as she picked up Red.

"RED!" Ashley roared, her hair began tinting white, as her eyes burned with a crimson palette, "Do you REALIZE how GOOD I was doing?"

Red looked at Ashley, scared out of his mind as he flailed, however, no amount of flailage could prepare Red for...
134.title: Accidental Apprentice Eating

choices: new spell where she grow's bigger the more she eats?

most of her Life Ashley has been short but now she's gonna get the chance to be bigger.

how will she grow and how big?
14.title: Giantess

15.content: Perhaps a combination of the above?
15.title: other

153.content:
Among her spells, Ashley found one she found particularly amusing, one that can turn the person it's cast on into a living vacuum cleaner of sorts...

Another spell would cause anyone she ate to start swelling up once they're inside her...

And she could always keep looking for more spells to use...
153.title: Inflation+Vore

choices: Just suck up some random objects.
Cast it on somebody else first, you can never be too careful with magic.
1531.content: Ashley smiled as she read the vacuum spell. She liked that one, the only question was, how to test it.
1531.title: Yes, but who?

1533.content:
She looks for a couple more spells to try out...

The next one she finds interesting is one where the person she consumes will become whatever she wants to be filled up with, all while keeping them conscious.

Another can turn her into a liquid being able to produce limitless quantities of what she'd be made of.

And she's still trying to see if there's other options she could take...
1533.title: Keep looking.

info.brief_description: Ashley from Wario Ware is gonna grow and grow.
